name: Roll For Damage
description:
A simple roguelite developed for weeklyjam 153 with the theme "roll" this was incorperated into roll for damage by the beauty that is dice guns, they fire dice

Controls

wasd - movement

space - dodge

mouse - to aim

left click - fire 

scroll wheel - swap weapons

E - interact

Esc - pause

Developed by 2 programmers

thedarkmagi @MillsOlly
Trace Of Cyan @TraceOfCyan

Weapon sprites by @vvictors99

majority of art assets from https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-8bit-topdown made by Johan Vinet
